description: Ratio of totient to Carmichael's lambda function is 2.
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
mathematica: Reap[ For[ n = 1, n <= 161, n++, If[ EulerPhi[n] / CarmichaelLambda[n] == 2, Sow[n]]]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Mar 26 2013 *)
